description:
The pheromones are strong with Itsuki.  When his true personality is released his power is unmatched and almost unstoppable.  What will the Special Astronomy Investigation Team do?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: TTR Tenmon-bu Tokusou Chousahan Tenmon Special Hateshinaki (Pheromone)
TTR 天悶部特捜調査班 天悶スペシャル 果てしなき香草(フェロモン)
The Astronomy Club`s Special Endless Herb Pheromone
